Miscellaneous Notes

2-139: See § 1-637.1.

DC CODE § 38-1305

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: There shall be transferred to the Commission such positions and their funding that formerly were assigned to the Board of Higher Education for the approval and licensure of post-secondary institutions.
Personnel shall be appointed and compensation fixed in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 6 of Title 1.
The Commission may set up panels of persons qualified to inspect, evaluate and make recommendations concerning the approval for licensure of the several kinds of institutions covered by this chapter.

heading.catch_text: Education Licensure Commission--Transfer of positions; personnel; establishment of panels.
